description: Chave primária. Breve descrição de vários tipos de erros/avisos aplicados aos valores na tabela `activities`.

sample_rows.descricao: Data have been checked against the publication and are believed to be accurate
Units for this activity type are unusual and may be incorrect (or the standard_type may be incorrect)
Values for this activity type are unusually large/small, so may not be accurate
Data have been checked against the publication and are as reported - possibly an error was made by the author
No data provided for value, units or activity_comment, needs further investigation
